com.flexganttfx.extras

Class VirtualGridControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.control.Control
            • com.flexganttfx.view.util.FlexGanttFXControl
              • com.flexganttfx.extras.VirtualGridControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class VirtualGridControl
extends FlexGanttFXControl
    A control used to select a VirtualGrid from a list of possible virtual grids.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      javafx.beans.property.StringProperty noGridText
      Returns the property used for managing the text shown by the "no grid" button.
      javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty showNoGridOption
      Controls whether the control should present an option to the user to disable the grid completely.
      javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<VirtualGrid<?>> value
      The property used to store the currently selected VirtualGrid.
